body.name: INFANS Kids Tricycle, 4 in 1 Stroll Trike with Adjustable Push Handle, Removable Canopy, Retractable Foot Plate, Lockable Pedal, Detachable Guardrail, Suitable for 10 Months to 5 Years (Red)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 27. Order within 10 hrs 35 mins.
features: ❤️4 IN 1 TRICYCLE, GROW WITH YOUR KIDS: With multifunction design, this tricycle can be transformed into four modes of use: push stroll, push trike, training trike and classic trike. The transition between the four modes is convenient, and all the parts are easy to disassemble and install. This tricycle can grow up with a child from 10 months to 5 years which will be a rewarding investment for your child's childhood. Our 4 in 1 tricycle will be one of the good memories of you kids’ childhood.

❤️ADJUSTABLE PUSH HANDLE, CONVENIENT FOR PARENTS TO USE: When kids can't ride independently, parents can easily use the push handle to control the steering and speed of this tricycle. The height of the push handle can be adjusted to meet the different needs of parents. With this push handle, parents don’t need to bent over the body or make hand be pressed from the both sides any more. The push handle is also removable to let kids enjoy the free riding.

❤️SCIENTIFIC DESIGN, ENSURE THE SAFETY: Considering the safety of the child when using trike, we did security designs in many details. There is a detachable sponge guardrail on the seat which can also be opened for kids to get on. The extra perpendicular safety strap not only prevents the child from falling, but also wraps the button to avoid harm to the child. The 3-point safety harness on the seat provides the perfect combination of comfort and child safety.

❤️USER-FRIENDLY PEDAL & WHEELS, FOCUS ON DETAILS: In view of the variety of outdoor terrain, we use high quality EVA material for wheels. The inflatable-free light wheels also have shock absorption structure which makes tires are wear resisting enough to available for multiple ground surfaces. There are retractable foot pegs on the frame to let baby's feet have right place to place under puling stroll mode. There is a front wheel clutch to release or limit the foot pedal according the needs.

❤️ADJUSTABLE CANOPY, TAKE CARE OF THE CHILDREN'S PLAY：Playing outdoors enables children to feel happy. Owing to the uncertainty of the weather, this tricycle comes with an adjustable canopy to block out direct sunlight. And the seat cushion is removable, if it gets dirty, it can be easily cleaned and maintained. The handlebar also equip with a bell to add more fun for children's play. The 4 in 1 trike has a detachable basket to storage little things like drinks, toys…

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Stroller Mode 2 Push Trike Mode 3 Training Mode 4 Independent Mode

Detachable Safety Guardrail Convenient for baby to get on the trick Foldable Footrest Let baby’s feet have right place to put Front Wheel Clutch Release or limit the foot pedal 2 Rear Wheel Brakes Easy for parents to stop with foot control

What is the recommended age range and weight capacity for this trike? This trike is suitable for children aged 10 months to 5 years old and has a weight capacity of 50 lbs. What is the main material of this trike? The whole frame of the trike is made of iron. Can the push handle of this trike be removed? Yes, the push handle can be moved and turn into a independent mode. Can the foot pedals of the trike lock? Yes, just use the front wheel clutch to release or limit the foot pedal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The INFANS Kids Tricycle is a versatile and well-designed ride for toddlers. The 4-in-1 functionality, including an adjustable push handle, removable canopy, retractable footplate, and lockable pedal, provides adaptability as your child grows. The sturdy construction ensures safety, and the detachable guardrail adds an extra layer of security. The vibrant red color adds a playful touch. Suitable for ages 10 months to 5 years, this tricycle offers a comfortable and enjoyable ride for your little one’s developmental stages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this tricycle
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my son's first birthday, he loves it, I love it. Easy to assemble. I especially love that it grows as he grows. Plus side my other toddler can use it as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My baby just love itHe never sat in stroller but he enjoying to sit in this oneSmooth to rideMany useful featuresStrong material

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Está muy fácil de armar. Lo compré para mí nieto. La verdad me gusta mucho porque no está nada pesado en absoluto. Solo esperando que mi nieto siga creciendo para que el solo pedalee el triciclo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really nice bike
reviews.reviewText: This bike went together fairly easily, no cursing or banging. There is an option for placing the seat, either closer or a bit further away from the front of the bike. As we have an 18 month old I first used the set of holes that placed the seat closer to the pedals and handlebars. But our boy found this uncomfortable; he could not place his feet on the pads designed for smaller children before they are old enough to reach the pedals. Our boy ended-up putting his feet i=on the front fender, and his feet kept falling into the front wheel. I moved the seat back to the other set of holes and this pretty well somved the problem until he grows. The steering is comfortable, our boy likes ringing the bell, and the canopy is appreciated on sunny or rainy days. Wish there was a cup holder for Dad's water bottle, but you cannot have everything. Very pleased with our purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well built product
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my 2 years old. Very well build, and strong. The pushing handle can control the front wheel. Instructions are very easy to understand and easy to set up. Took it for a walk and the wide tires are very stable and easily controlled, like the break function it's good for parking but still it will be better to keep holding it with one hand for safety while parked if the kid is riding. Hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product and company is amazing. Very excited for the warmer weather to take my nephew out in this. What a great set of Customer service workers as well. I had a tiny issue with a mistake that I made and they took care of it right away. I will recommend to anyone I know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved it baby enjoyed the big kid feel

The bike seems to be very sturdy. We purchased this because of the clutch mechanism for the pedals which allows them to free wheel and saving them from hitting shins. The handle adjusts easily and is high enough.Assembly time was about a half hour.
My almost 3yo son loves it so muchHe can't stop riding his bike😅

Delivery was fast and well packaged. Assembly was easy and took me about 20 minutes to put it all together. I did have a small defect in the canopy as it wouldn't open easily. I contacted the seller and was sent a new canopy. I'm really happy with the purchase and would recommend it to other buyers.
Got it as a gift for my 1 year old niece.. she absolutely adores it and the parents fond it much easier to handle than a full stroller.. would recommend the product..
